response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $12,000. Considering the high quality and potential benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $15,000. This offer not only ensures you receive the best value but also secures your position as one of our esteemed clients. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 15000}
